definition.name: NXsts
definition.doc:
An application definition to describe Scanning Tunneling Spectroscopy (STS).
NXsts is an extension of NXspm.

field.name: definition
field.doc: Name of the definition that is used for the application.

field.name: scan_mode
field.doc: The mode between the tip and sample of the tunneling spectroscopy experiment.

group.name: bias_spectroscopy_environment
group.doc: To explain bias (sweep measurement) voltage applied to the sample.
Setup and scan data for continuous measurement of bias-voltage on the subject of experiment vs tunneling current from probe.

group.name: reproducibility_indicators
group.doc: The group's concepts hold the link to the related concepts that define the reproducibility of the STM experiment.

field.name: current
field.doc:
The tunneling current between tip and sample after application of bias voltage. This should be a link to /ENTRY[*]/INSTRUMENT[*]/current_sensorTAG/current
Note: group name (could be any meaningful and relevant name e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.

field.name: current_offset
field.doc:
The offset in tunneling current between tip and sample after application of bias voltage. This should be a link to /ENTRY[*]/INSTRUMENT[*]/current_sensorTAG[current_sensor*]/current_offset
Note: group name (could be any meaningful and relevant name e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.

field.name: current_gain
field.doc:
Proportional relationship between the probe output voltage and the actual tunneling current when measuring the tunneling current. This should be a link to /ENTRY[*]/INSTRUMENT[*]/current_sensorTAG[current_sensor*]/amplifier/current_gain
Note: group name (could be any meaningful and relevant name e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.

group.name: BIAS_SWEEP
group.doc:

Note: group name (could be any meaningful and relevant name e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.

Note: group name (could be any meaningful and relevant name e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.

field.name: reference_frequency
field.doc:

Note: group name (could be any meaningful and relevant name e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) inside the square bracket would be the `exact` name of the NXentry group.
